The user launches a large jet of water from their mouth through their cupped hand. This gives the appearance of playing a [[wikipedia:trumpet|trumpet]], hence the name.

== Trivia ==
* The Japanese romanisation of this technique's name, ''Suiton: Mizurappa'', and the [[hand seals]] used for its activation are the same as [[Water Release: Wild Water Wave]].
